activities: During registration onto our websites or into our programs, we collect individual name, demographic information, phone number, email address, birth date, health care provider professional credentials.  We collect this information so individuals can participate in surveys and educational programs related to health care.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Information may include name, shipping address, phone number, fax number, email address, date of birth, demographics, professional designation, specialty, state license number, medical school and year of graduation, credit card information
privacyprograms: Physicians Interactive has a self-regulatory privacy program and are also subject to frequent audits from clients.
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union and Switzerland (Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner) or their authorized representatives
